description.@value: Dataspace is designed to facilitate the exchange of (sensitive) data for both individuals and organizations. Dataspace regulations, consent processes, and contractual requirements will secure and accelerate data sharing. This building block could enable new business models and incentives for the use of existing data. This structural component will enable the monitoring of data providers and their contributions, as well as data usage, to ensure fair compensation for all parties involved.

functionalities.@value: PTX-asset point generation: Use the PTX-asset point to participate, contribute, and engage within the PTX ecosystem.
Traceable data usage contribution: monitor individuals and organizations' contributions in an immutable way, with cryptographic verification, tamper-proof, and auditable.
Visualize contributions to gain an overview, understand data/service usage, and determine the value of your data.
